Starring Halle Berry. Kidnap is about a single mother played by Halle Berry ), who takes cares of her young son One day at the park the boy is kidnapped by two people and then she chases them in order to rescue her son risking her life and everything she has That s the story. .. pretty simple. The chase between Halle Berry and the kidnappers lasts for like 90 minutes which is over half of the film actually like the first Spielberg s film Duel The plot is as I said soooo simple cos it s juts about rescuing her son that s all So for me you bette watch it only when you feel tired but feel like watch ing something simple This is the one However you better not anticipate this movie to be good and better not to watch its trailer cos that shows some Halle Berry's fantastic performances which are one of the great stuff in that film. I could pick up a lot of failure stuff about this film actually cos it s a completely sh am. But I somehow enjoyed watch ing her crazily chasing the van that has her son This kind of action movie has the same ending as you may know so perhaps you could predict how this ends but it s good and a lso it s only 90m inutes long that is a perfect running time for those sort of movies I guess. Thank you for reading my brief review of Kidnap "!!.
